job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: would you like to join an awardwinning company which is changing and building the future telecom providing allg cloudnative openran portfolio in their bestinclass products read on if your answer is yesltbrgtltbrgtmy client a world leading telco vendor is currently seeking a sr layer stack sw engineer with years of cc development of embedded realtime components and good understanding of glte standard exposure to help expand my clients offering across the globe this is a great opportunity to join an organization dedicated to its customer base through its desire to deliver disruptive radio productsltbrgtltbrgtwhat you must bring to the teamltbrgtltbrgt must plus years experience in cc programming language development of embeddedrealtime components of a multithreaded systemltbrgt possess strong foundation in troubleshooting and debugging activities in endtoend software development cycleltbrgt ability to work independently without close supervision and act as a part of a global team in a multisite organizationltbrgt demonstrates good understanding of communication protocols ability to translate ll standards and specifications towards efficient implementationltbrgt solid handson experience with sw development methodologies design documentation sw implementation unit testing etcltbrgt essential to have strong communication skillsltbrgt must bsc in computer science computer engineering or top idf sw development unitltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtnice to haveltbrgt experience in linux os user application developmentltbrgt past experience with telecom communication standards preferable ggltbrgt past experience with containersdockerskubernetes ks technologiesltbrgt experienced with ran associated test equipments such as ue simulatorsqxdmltbrgt experience with cellular modems design implementation etcltbrgt
